snippet: Stan Wawrinka will play for a third successive Chennai Open title in the final against Borna Coric, the youngest finalist on the ATP Tour in eight years....
lead_paragraph: Stan Wawrinka will play for a third successive Chennai Open title in the final against Borna Coric, the youngest finalist on the ATP Tour in eight years.

headline.print_headline: Top-Seeded Wawrinka in Line for 4th Chennai Open Title
headline.main: Top-Seeded Wawrinka in Line for 4th Chennai Open Title
